mapper.select: /* noticeVO */ SELECT ROWNUM AS RM ,NB.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , EMP_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONT , NOTICE_DT , NOTICE_VIEWS , ATCH_FILE_CD FROM NOTICE_BOARD ORDER BY NOTICE_DT ASC ) NB ORDER BY RM DESC

SELECT NB.* ,AFD.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_ORLNG AS atchFileNm ,AFD.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_SAVENM AS saveNm FROM NOTICE_BOARD NB LEFT OUTER JOIN ATCH_FILE_DETAIL AFD ON NB.ATCH_FILE_CD = AFD.ATCH_FILE_CD where NB.NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board SET Notice_views = Notice_views + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeViews}
